comments.body:
`-nameopt` switch should be used in order to be compatible with OpenSSL >= 1.1.0: the default format was [changed](https://github.com/openssl/openssl/commit/9cf315ef90d0cfeb8bb7a38873eea07a8f0dffec) between OpenSSL 1.0.2 and OpenSSL 1.1.0.

For example `openssl req -noout -subject -in csr -nameopt oneline,-space_eq` with `csr_cn.stdout.split('=')[-1]` could be used.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@  register: privatekey_modulus

- name: Validate CSR (test - Common Name)
  shell: "openssl req -noout -subject -in {{ output_dir }}/csr.csr -nameopt oneline,-space_eq"
  register: csr_cn
